int cvmx_power_throttle ( uint8_t  percentage,
cvmx_coremask_t *  pcm 
)

Throttle power to percentage% of configured maximum (MAXPOW) for the cores identified in coremask.

Parameters:
percentage 0 to 100
pcm bit mask where each bit identifies a core.
Returns:
0 for success and -1 for error.

cvmx_power_throttle_rfield_t *  r,
bool  write 
) [static]

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Given ppid, read/write COP0 Power Throttle register.

Parameters:
ppid : Core id.
r : COP0 power throttling fields
write,: If set, update COP0 PowThr register else read.

Get the POWLIM field as percentage% of the MAXPOW field in r.

Returns:
